title: Look x Restrap pair up for limited edition, ultra-shiny gravel bike & bikepacking bags collab
content:
Look Cycles & Restrap bags have joined gravel forces to produce a crazy rainbow shiny iridescent set of limited edition bikepacking bags, and a suitably matching iridescent-accented Look 765 Gravel RS frameset to hang them on. It’s the latest in Restraps’s limited edition series of bags, added to Looks popular racy carbon gravel bike. Look

The post Look x Restrap pair up for limited edition, ultra-shiny gravel bike & bikepacking bags collab appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
